attributes.action: Investigate the posibility of using GEO-THERMAL sources of energy as a green atlternative energy source
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The number of spa towns in Britain is evidence of the ease with which geo-thermal sources of energy can be accessed.
We call on the government to investigate this alternative source of green energy both with regard to possible large scale power stations and smaller local schemes.
